verses.verse: Brothers, <WG80> my heart's <WG2588> desire <WG2107> and prayer <WG1162> to God <WG2316> for Israel <WG2474> is, that they might be saved. <WG4991>
For I bear <WG3140> them record <WG3140> that they have <WG2192> a zeal <WG2205> of God, <WG2316> but not according <WG2596> to knowledge. <WG1922>

For they being ignorant <WG50> of God's <WG2316> righteousness, <WG1343> and going <WG2212> about <WG2212> to establish <WG2476> their own <WG2398> righteousness, <WG1343> have <WG2192> not submitted <WG5293> themselves to the righteousness <WG1343> of God. <WG2316>
For Christ <WG5547> is the end <WG5056> of the law <WG3551> for righteousness <WG1343> to every <WG3956> one <WG3956> that believes. <WG4100>
For Moses <WG3475> describes <WG1125> the righteousness <WG1343> which <WG3588> is of the law, <WG3551> That the man <WG444> which does <WG4160> those <WG846> things shall live <WG2198> by them.

But the righteousness <WG1343> which is of faith <WG4102> speaks <WG3004> on this <WG3779> wise, Say <WG2036> not in your <WG4675> heart, <WG2588> Who <WG5101> shall ascend <WG305> into <WG1519> heaven? <WG3772> (that is, to bring <WG2609> Christ <WG5547> down <WG2609> from above:)
Or, <WG2228> Who <WG5101> shall descend <WG2597> into <WG1519> the deep? <WG12> (that is, to bring <WG321> up Christ <WG5547> again <WG321> from the dead. <WG3498>)

But what <WG5101> said <WG3004> it? The word <WG4487> is near <WG1451> you, even in your mouth, <WG4750> and in your heart: <WG2588> that is, the word <WG4487> of faith, <WG4102> which <WG3739> we preach; <WG2784>

That if <WG1437> you shall confess <WG3670> with your mouth <WG4750> the Lord <WG2962> Jesus, <WG2424> and shall believe <WG4100> in your <WG4675> heart <WG2588> that God <WG2316> has raised <WG1453> him from the dead, <WG3498> you shall be saved. <WG4982>
For with the heart <WG2588> man believes <WG4100> to righteousness; <WG1343> and with the mouth <WG4750> confession <WG3670> is made <WG3670> to salvation. <WG4991>
For the scripture <WG1124> said, <WG3004> Whoever <WG3956> <WG3588> believes <WG4100> on <WG1909> him shall not be ashamed. <WG2617>

For there is no <WG3756> difference <WG1293> between the Jew <WG2453> and the Greek: <WG1672> for the same <WG846> Lord <WG2962> over all <WG3956> is rich <WG4147> to all <WG3956> that call <WG1941> on him.
For whoever <WG3956> shall call <WG1941> on the name <WG3686> of the Lord <WG2962> shall be saved. <WG4982>

How <WG4459> then <WG3767> shall they call <WG1941> on <WG1941> him in whom <WG3739> they have not believed? <WG4100> and how <WG4459> shall they believe <WG4100> in him of whom <WG3739> they have not heard? <WG191> and how <WG4459> shall they hear <WG191> without <WG5565> a preacher? <WG2784>

And how <WG5613> shall they preach, <WG2784> except <WG3362> they be sent? <WG649> as it is written, <WG1125> How beautiful <WG5611> are the feet <WG4228> of them that preach <WG2097> the gospel <WG2097> of peace, <WG1515> and bring <WG2097> glad <WG2097> tidings <WG2097> of good <WG18> things! <WG18>
But they have not all <WG3956> obeyed <WG5219> the gospel. <WG2098> For Esaias <WG2268> said, <WG3004> Lord, <WG2962> who <WG5101> has believed <WG4100> our report? <WG189>
So <WG686> then <WG686> faith <WG4102> comes by hearing, <WG189> and hearing <WG189> by the word <WG4487> of God. <WG2316>

But I say, <WG3004> Have they not heard? <WG191> Yes <WG3304> truly, <WG3304> their sound <WG5353> went <WG1831> into <WG1519> all <WG3956> the earth, <WG1093> and their words <WG4487> to the ends <WG4009> of the world. <WG3625>

But I say, <WG3004> Did not Israel <WG2474> know? <WG1097> First <WG4413> Moses <WG3475> said, <WG3004> I will provoke <WG3863> you to jealousy by them that are no <WG3756> people, <WG1484> and by a foolish <WG801> nation <WG1484> I will anger <WG3949> you.

But Esaias <WG2268> is very <WG662> bold, <WG662> and said, <WG3004> I was found <WG2147> of them that sought <WG2212> me not; I was made <WG1096> manifest <WG1717> to them that asked <WG1905> not after <WG1905> me.
But to Israel <WG2474> he said, <WG3004> All <WG3650> day <WG2250> long I have stretched <WG1600> forth <WG1600> my hands <WG5495> to a disobedient <WG544> and gainsaying <WG483> people. <WG2992>
